Detailed Description

The Animation base class. A user algorithm must inherit from this class to implement its animation

Definition at line 436 of file LibAlgoSim.h.

Initialises for listening events of type state

Member Function Documentation

virtual void Animation_base::process ( const state &  s  )  [pure virtual]

Must be overridden by user algo. This is called whenever a event of type state occurs. It should process the state event and perform the necessary actions.

Parameters:
s the event parameter. The state for which animations are to be produced.

void Animation_base::processEvent ( const state &  s  ) 

Processes based of incoming states. Calls the virtual function process() for further processing by user animation class

Parameters:
s the state sent by the EventSender
